doc:
Alice B. Russell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alice_B._Russell 0 Alice Burton Russell (June 30, 1892 – December 1984) was an African-American actress and the wife of director Oscar Micheaux, who appeared in six films directed by her husband. The daughter of Mrs. M. J. Russell, she was born in Maxton, North Carolina and died in New Rochelle, New York. She was mentioned often as A. Burton Russell in credits. In addition, she produced three films by her husband and worked as miscellaneous crew in two films. Russell and Micheaux married on March 20, 1926, in Montclair, New Jersey. Alice_Burton_Russell ( June_30_,_1892 – December_1984 ) was an_African-American_actress and the_wife of director_Oscar_Micheaux , who appeared in six_films directed by her_husband . The_daughter of Mrs._M._J._Russell , she was_born in Maxton , North_Carolina and died in New_Rochelle , New_York . She was_mentioned often as A._Burton_Russell in credits . In addition , she produced three_films by her_husband and worked as miscellaneous_crew in two_films . Russell_and_Micheaux married on March_20_,_1926 , in Montclair , New_Jersey .
